messages.message: Based on @mfichmanâ€™s great idea (:ty:), we now can create a separate `env-local-overrides.json` file that's git-ignored. Env vars in this file will override those set in `env-local.json`. Check out the PR (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/55158) for more details. Note that we'll have to create the file locally.
